March 27, 1983 D Huddersfield & District BBA Spring Contest (Section C)
Huddersfield & District BBA Spring Contest (Section C) 30 Own Choice Test Piece Contest Huddersfield & District BBA Spring Contest huddersfield-district-bba-spring-contest-3672
None
Town Hall, Dewsbury, West Yorkshire Prizes - 1st £50 and trophy, 2nd £40, 3rd £30. Best cornet - Boarshurst. 10 bands competed.
